spec_data.Name: perl-Shipwright
spec_data.Description:
Shipwright is a tool to help you bundle your software with all its dependencies,
regardless of whether they are CPAN modules or non-Perl modules from elsewhere.
Shipwright makes the bundle work easy.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 13 Nov 2017 08:42:16 AM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Build and Manage Self-contained Software Bundle
